dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HRES 202 IH: Censuring Representative Lauren Boebert of Colorado for her recent disparaging and derogatory comments about Representative Al Green of Texas.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Houlahan submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Ethics

form.official-title: Censuring Representative Lauren Boebert of Colorado for her recent disparaging and derogatory comments about Representative Al Green of Texas.

whereas.text: Whereas, on March 7, 2025, during an interview with Real America’s Voice News, Representative Lauren Boebert of Colorado said “For him to go and shake his pimp cane” about another Member, Representative from Texas, Mr. Al Green; and

Whereas the words of the Representative from Colorado are disparaging, derogatory, and racist toward another colleague, and are a breach of proper conduct and decorum of the U.S. House of Representatives: Now, therefore, be it

paragraph.text: Representative Lauren Boebert forthwith present herself in the well of the House of Representatives for the pronouncement of censure; and
) Representative Lauren Bobert be censured with the public reading of this resolution by the Speaker.
